lines.text: Of course I would lie to you, I'm a guy. But I'm not lying now.
You're not *at* the bottom of the list, you *are* the bottom of the list.
The competition looks a little weirder than I expected.
[followed by the howling sound of a coyote]
Let's just say I slipped on a bar of soap in the shower as a bus ran out of control and crashed into the medicine cabinet.
I risked my life, and you give me Light Beer?

[Walking away from Rex]
I have nothing to say to you.
Well I'm sure if you just took the time to get to know me we could work something out.
Wanna fool around? Wanna get married? Want fellatio or what? If I'm being too forward, just tell me to back off.
Um, how about a name first.
Why don't you come on in and shut the door. Why don't you lock it. Why don't you...
I think I can take it from here.
Well, you just made it through the world's most dangerous rapid... and now... it's beer time!
You mean I risked my life and you give me lite-beer?
